tool_description: Analyzes order and fulfillment performance across different geographic regions, identifying regional patterns, shipping efficiency, and location-specific optimization opportunities.

geographic_level.description: Level of geographic analysis: country, state, city, zip_code

delivery_method.description: Filter by delivery method: standard, express, overnight, pickup

cost_analysis.description: Include shipping cost analysis by region

distance_calculation.description: Method for distance calculation: straight_line, driving, shipping_route

rural_urban_split.description: Separate analysis for rural vs urban areas

error_messages: Invalid geographic level: Use one of [country, state, city, zip_code]
Invalid regions specified: Some region identifiers are not recognized
Invalid delivery method: Use one of [standard, express, overnight, pickup, all]
Invalid distance calculation method: Use one of [straight_line, driving, shipping_route]
Insufficient geographic data: Some regions lack sufficient data for analysis
Weather data unavailable: Weather correlation requires additional data access permissions
usage: Specify geographic_level and optionally filter regions. Configure analysis options like shipping zones, cost analysis, and environmental factors for comprehensive regional insights.
